page.title: 01ROOKHOPE
page.content: Thirty miles to the west of Durham City lies Weardale. It extends from Wolsingham in the west to Cowshill in the east, from Stanhope in the south to{Rookhope}in the north. Rookhope is a quiet village three miles north of Eastgate and the A689 Trunk Road from Durham to Penrith. Approximately three hundred people live in the village and its outlying farms. There is a general store and a Post Office in the centre of the village; together with the local Primary School, the Rookhope Inn, the Workingmen's Club and a well-established Nursery Garden. The Village Hall encourages community involvement and participation.
